code: const initialState={isAuthenticated:false,user:null,loading:false,error:null};export const authReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'LOGIN_REQUEST':return{...state,loading:true,error:null};case'LOGIN_SUCCESS':return{...state,isAuthenticated:true,user:action.payload,loading:false};case'LOGIN_FAILURE':return{...state,isAuthenticated:false,user:null,loading:false,error:action.payload};case'LOGOUT':return initialState;default:return state;}};export default authReducer;
